name: Mystics and Minstrels
description:
In this card game you build a party of fantasy heroes and take them on a glorious adventure through strange lands battling mythical creatures!

This game is about creating powerful combinations of heroes and quickly finding out how well they work together.

Each game you are given a different set of cards to choose between, once you've picked that's it! All that is left is to find out your score, which is done by stepping the party you've made through an epic adventure!
